short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Captures automated tests to check your Shop's health

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to capture automated tests for your Shopify website to make sure changes in themes or 3rd party application don't affect your page's functionality. The extension allows exporting a JSON file which can be uploaded to the Shop Health Check application from your Shop's admin UI.
